posts.description: It continues to be an amazing week free-diving with these amazing Oceanics off the deep ledges of Cat Island. Here, good buddy @perrinjames1 gets the shot in the deep blue.

Yesterday was a memorable day at sea with good friends, ending with something we've all dreamed of for years: a night dive in the black water with the Oceanic Whitetips. So grateful for our oceans üôèüèº @moorecharitable @ceibahamas @google

A large Tiger plays hard to get under the dock. Just look at that beautiful tail. It's good to be back in the Bahamas, the sharkiest place in the world. It's probably a good idea to double check your landings here before your next backflip!  Stoked to be joining friends @seabacon @perrinjames1 @sharkgirlmadison @charlescrayola @ollieshipley27 @mbond8 @lucyahowey @debra.abercrombie @captinjoeydafish @maggiew27 @epicdiving @seawilliams for a few weeks of sharks and science.

Fist full of brushes! Amazing landscape painter @emilieleelee bottling last light in Monument Valley and spilling it onto canvas. A candid moment from a road trip across the Southwest with my favorite artists @ladzinski @chrisburkard @gregoryalanisakov @jercollins_com @stirratt2 @andy_best @bhatcherphoto @dianeculhaneart #convergencefilm

Happy Earth Day! Let the collective positive impact we have as a single voice for change ring loud all the way the bottom of the planet!  It's a long uphill battle to righting our wrongs but I believe every step up that hill is a step in the right direction. // Thanks @paulnicklen and @cristinamittermeier for experiences like this one: An evening on the ice with a Weddell Seal that still feels like a dream. Well this place is real and In 2018 there will be a vote to project the Antarctica Peninsula by an organization called CCAMLR in Hobart, Tasmania. We'll be there. @sea_legacy #CCAMLR2018 @natgeo @ladzinski @craigwelch @ianvaso @pattersonimages @3stringsproductions @sadiequarrier
Sometimes the best fishing spots are the hardest to get to. @trippin_on_trout fighting cold, fast currents down in New Zealand. @costasunglasses @cainedelacy @ponderingtype @flyfishingnz
Another scene of the Azorean Sperm Whale encounter. An unforgettable moment surrounded by our planet's largest tooth carnivore. Gentle giants of the sea. @waittfoundation @thejoelepore

Today is the final day to help donate to ocean conservation. It's so easy. Have a look! I'm offering a select gallery of ocean-based prints (this one included) through @smugmug and donating the profits to @sea_legacy. (30% off with code: FIREHOUSE). Sea Legacy, founded by @paulnicklen & @cristinamittermeier, is a non-profit creating powerful media to change the narrative around our world's oceans and inspiring the global communities to protect our oceans. Here is a great way to donate first hand! Any size and price is available. We just need your help. üôèüèº *Link in Profile* // Thanks @kaydin_carlsen for the curation and help on this unique project!

@kai_lenny in his element. The ship, maybe not so much. Just another day, different board as we continue to cross Island-to-island. Conditions are singing here off the coast of Lanai. @redbull @poorboyzproductions  @sustainablecoastlineshawaii @5gyres

Those crystal blue Bahamian waters and a gentle visit from the King, the Oceanic Whitetip. Basically my dreams coming to fruition. // For the next week I'll be offering a select gallery of ocean-based prints through @smugmug and donating the profits to @sea_legacy. (30% off with code: FIREHOUSE). Sea Legacy, founded by @paulnicklen & @cristinamittermeier, is a non-profit creating powerful media to change the narrative around our world's oceans and inspiring the global communities to protect our oceans. Here is a great way to donate first hand! Any size and price is available. We just need your help. üôèüèº *Link in Profile*

New Zealand is full of magic. Travelers trek to Cathedral Cove, a magical destination tucked away on the Coromandel Peninsula. To get there, find the trail at the north end of Hahei Beach and walk along the towering cliff top until the hidden Cathedral Cove beckons you from below. The gigantic arched cavern, white-sand beaches, and seclusion will leave you breathless.

Share your most adventurous shots for your chance at a worldwide adventure. Follow @RoyalCaribbean to find out how you can be crowned The World‚Äôs Most Adventurous Squad. For details and official rules go to adventuresquad.com.

Photo: @andy_mann // Two days ago @kai_lenny rewrote the book of possibilities by crossing Alenuihaha Channel, considered one of the most treacherous crossings in the world, from the big island of Hawaii to Maui. By harnessing open ocean swells, Kai floats above the water on his 5'6" hydrofoil surfboard and rides hidden waves for hours at speeds up to 22 miles an hour. He also swooped up ocean trash along the way. Today he shattered the record from Molokai to Oahu. Thanks for the inspiration, Kai. It's been an unforgettable week! @sustainablecoastlineshawaii @redbull

A team of climbers, Mike Libecki and Angie Payne, approach the unclimbed North Face of Poumaka, a remote jungle tower on Ua Pou Island in the Marquesas Islands. The island geology is mind blowing, with 12 volcanic rock towers jetting out of the misty, tropical jungle. Each tower has its own lore and history, and the pinnacles are a sight to be seen. I‚Äôll never forget the view from this plateau. Share your most adventurous shots for your chance at a worldwide adventure. // Follow @RoyalCaribbean to find out how you can be crowned The World‚Äôs Most Adventurous Squad. For details and official rules go to adventuresquad.com.

Explorer Mike Libecki leaves basecamp on his way up a valley in the remote southeastern fjords of Greenland. With almost 24 hours of daylight in mid-summer months, the window for exploration never closes‚Äîfor visitors or the area‚Äôs wildlife. Polar bears lurk behind every corner and arctic foxes may try to steal your leftovers. 
Share your most adventurous shots for your chance at a worldwide adventure. Follow @RoyalCaribbean to find out how you can be crowned The World‚Äôs Most Adventurous Squad. For details and official rules go to adventuresquad.com.

Fleeting moment of Antarctic perfection. Good buddy @ladzinski burning his own quiet memory from a nearby hillside. I'm so grateful to have shared this expedition with @paulnicklen @cristinamittermeier @ladzinski @ianvaso @shanemoorefilms @craigwelch @pattersonimages and together sharing the responsibility of telling a story of a threatened ecosystem in time for a crucial #CCAMLR2018 vote to protect it. Shot on assignment for @natgeo & @sea_legacy // @sonyalpha #alphacollective

*Link in profile* Let the oceans roar and let the mountains tremble. For the next 3 days I'll be offering a select gallery of ocean-based prints through @smugmug and donating the profits to @sea_legacy. (30% off with code: FIREHOUSE). Here is a great way to donate first hand! Any size and price is available. We just need your help.
